title: Was Inaki Williams' goal for Athletic Bilbao sensational or a fluke?
description: Athletic Bilbao forward  Inaki Williams scored a sensational opening goal against Getafe - but did he mean it?
content: The Spain international sent a looping volley over Emiliano Martinez with just 13 minutes on the clock at the Coliseum Alfonso Perez.Williams signed a new contract at San Mames on Wednesday, putting speculation of a move to the Premier League to bed.And the 23-year-old immediately began repaying the faith the Basque club showed in him with this stunning effort, showing his potential suitors what they are missing out on.But did Williams mean it or was it a fluke? Hit the video at the top of the story and decide for yourself!
